description.value:
Attached to the Spine and Lower Ribcage, acts as an anchorage for further implants, such as Mechadendrites.

Requirements

Gained only through "Mechanicus Implants" Trait, cannot be removed.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
description.summary: Attached to the Spine and Lower Ribcage, acts as an anchorage for further implants, such as Mechadendrites.
